name: Illustrated bowls with chopsticks
description:
A pair of hand illustrated bowls with two sets of hand burnt chopsticks!

The Story

These bowls have been invaded by the Kraken! Hand drawn by me, these bowls are enveloped with my signature flowing kraken patterns. Perfect for serving up small dishes of your favourite Japanese cuisine! The bowls feature two carry handles, making them perfect for your Christmas snacks and buffets, or as a side dish. The bowls arrive with bamboo chopsticks - each burnt by hand in the same pattern using a pyrography tool. 

Quality

Worked with high quality porcelain glaze, this pot is safe for use with food and daily washing. To keep the design fresh and pristine take care when scrubbing with abrasive materials!

If you are interested in a set of mugs, plates, bowls, teapots, tea and coffee cups and more! please just send me a message 

Love the design?

Take a look at my other ceramics featuring 'The Kraken' pattern

name: Chevron Hand Illustrated Bowl
description:
As they say, breakfast is the most important meal of the day. Don't let a mundane bowl of cereal make it seem like a chore! 

This hand drawn bowl was born out of a love for feathers, the pattern came into being after drawing crows and ravens and crows again. This design flows from the outside of the bowl into the interior before its dissipation into clean white ceramic goodness! 

♥ If you are interested in a set of mugs, plates, bowls, teapots, tea cups and more! Please just send me a message - discount available for bulk orders ♥

Hand signed on the bottom, this piece is unique and no two are the same!

Worked with high quality porcelain glaze, this bowl is suitable for your cereal or your favourite pasta dish! To keep the design fresh and pristine take care when scrubbing with abrasive materials.

name: Hand Painted Teacup - Kraken Patterned Coffee Cup
description:
The Kraken Story 

There's nothing quite like a 'Kraken Brew!', have yours in this hand illustrated teacup!

The Kraken has invaded this large bowl tea cup and its tentacles have woven around the cup and saucer!

Quality 

Worked with high quality porcelain glaze, this cup and saucer is dishwasher safe at 50 degrees C (keep it nice and eco!) and suitable for all manner of your favourite beverages! I would however suggest hand washing for the longevity of you piece of art! To keep the design fresh and pristine take care when scrubbing with abrasive materials.

Made to Order

This piece is made to order and painted by hand, please allow for slight variations in the design and a few days for your order to be made before shipping!

name: Kraken Brew Teapot - Hand Drawn
description:
The Kraken Story 

There's nothing quite like a 'Kraken Brew!', brew yours in this hand-drawn teapot!

The Kraken has invaded this full sized teapot and its tentacles have emerged from the spout, flowing all round the contours of this finely shaped pot!

Quality

Worked with high quality porcelain glaze and suitable for all manner of your favourite teas! To keep the design fresh and pristine take care when scrubbing with abrasive materials. 

Made to Order

This piece is made to order and painted by hand, please allow for slight variations in the design and a few days for your order to be made before shipping!

name: Hand Drawn Chevron Mug
description:
A classic white mug decorated with black chevron patterns inspired by feathers

Worked with high quality porcelain glaze, this mug is resilient and suitable for all manner of your favourite beverages! To keep the design fresh and pristine take care when scrubbing with abrasive materials.
